Ugoite Spec (v2)

This directory contains the current, canonical specification for Ugoite.

Start here:

  • index.md - Master navigation

What lives here

  • Architecture: architecture/
  • API: api/
  • Data Model: data-model/
  • Stories (YAML): stories/
  • Requirements (YAML + test mapping): requirements/
  • Feature Registry (API-level): features/
  • Security & Testing: security/, testing/

Conventions

  • "Form" is the user-facing term (legacy term: schema).
  • API paths: Backend paths are canonical; frontend calls the same path prefixed with /api.
  • Machine-readable docs: Stories, Requirements, and Features are expressed in YAML so we can validate docâ†”code consistency in tests.

Editing rules

  • When adding a new requirement, update the appropriate file in requirements/ and ensure the verifying tests exist.
  • When adding/removing endpoints, update the per-kind YAML files under features/ so code navigation stays accurate.
